content: वृजिन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Crooked, bent, curved. {@--2@} Wicked, sinful. --नः {@--1@} Hair, curled hair. {@--2@} A wicked man; वृणक्ति वृजिनैः संगं <ls>K.R.</ls> --नं {@--1@} Sin; सर्वं ज्ञानप्लवेनैव वृजिनं संतरिष्यसि <ls>Bg. 4. 36</ls>; निराकरिष्णोर्वृजिनादृतेऽपि <ls>R. 14. 57.</ls> {@--2@} Pain, distress (said to be {%<ab>m.</ab>%} also in this sense). {@--3@} Red leather.
